result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adan Lopez

records.addlTxt: STC for 10/24/22 adjourned to 12/9/22 at 9:30 am on court's motion; court unavailable on previously scheduled date.  Confirming email sent to parties.
Status conference on December 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.

02:23 PM  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant, Adan Lopez, appeared with Attorney William Paul Michel.   Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM304/22CT52. Attorney Michel advises the Court that the matter is not resolved and the DE has his assessment scheduled for this Friday. Attorney Michel is requesting an adjournment for reasons set forth on the record. The State does not object. Court adjourns.  Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

08:42 AM  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant, Adan Lopez, appeared with Attorney William Paul Michel, who appeared by telephone.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM304/22CT52. Attorney Michel is appearing by phone for reason set forth on the record. Attorney Michel was just appointed and received an offer from the State. Attorney Michel is requesting adjournment so he may meet and discuss the offer with the defendant. Court adjourns.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Order Appointing Counsel sent via email to Atty Michel
Status conference on July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Minutes:  22CM304/22CT52.  Judge Kluka acting for Branch 3.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Alex Smathers appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person pro se.  Deft is requesting advocate counsel.  Court will grant the deft's request.  Atty Wm. Michel is appointed.  JS date of 7/11 removed from court's calendar.  Status set for 7/15/22 @ 8:30am.  Deft instructed to contact his atty w/in a week.  Deft will be responsible for paying advocate counsel fees at the conclusion of the case; may have a payment plan.
from the Court re: judicial rotation 8/1/22
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: PE FOR APPT OF ATTY PLACED IN CRML CLRKS BIN
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.  kmk

CONTINUED POSTED
  PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

02:56 - 03:03 PM  
  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk PT  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not guilty plea entered by court on behalf of DE.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 02:40 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 09:10 am.  Jury selection scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.  $2000 Continued Posted  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).   jk
and witness list filed by the State
